alert.note: Alert for Bowie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:26AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Little River, southeastern Sevier and central Bowie Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 826 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Boston, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ashdown, New Boston, Foreman, Hooks, Lockesburg, Wilton, Ben Lomond, Richmond, Oak Grove, Central, Wallace, Millwood, Arden, Red Bank, Browntown, Pine Prairie and Bellview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Arkansas...southeastern Oklahoma...and northeastern Texas.
